text:
[Verse]
Lights down low glow tonight
Shadows come dance in the night
Whispering secrets so light
Under the pale moonlight

[Verse 2]
Feet move to beats unseen
Rhythm a sparkling sheen
Hearts sync in time so keen
Living a midnight dream

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows near
In the dark we have no fear
Let the music steer
Feel the magic here

[Verse 3]
Stars twinkle up above
Sky raining down pure love
Floating like feathers dove
Never want to leave this grove

[Verse 4]
Echoes of laughter ring
Through the cool air they sing
One simple
Perfect thing
In this moment
We are kings

[Bridge]
Time stands still in the dark
Every move leaves a mark
Find the spark in this park
Chase it till the morning lark
title: Dancing Shadows
